title: Alpha Hall of Famer + Cash for Four Base Hits card
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Alpha Hall of Famer + Cash for Four Base Hits card
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Preece1
I am looking for an 1887 Four Base Hits card of either Ward, Keefe, Welch or Clarkson.  I will trade 1894 Ned Hanlon Alpha or Wilbert Robinson Alpha + Cash.  Or just all cash.

If you are not interested in selling or trading, I would still like to see a scan of the card that you have if possible.

I will pay a nice cash reward for introducing me to a collector that has one of these cards if I am able to successfully buy the card.
